file_content.text: Elshuu is no more. The threat is ended.
The Republic and the galaxy are fortunate you showed up.
May the Force be with you. Always.
[You activate the monitoring station terminal and set it to the Republic frequency.]
All forces in Deep Prison, this is Master Vij Markos with a mission override special order. Respond if you are receiving me.
Hello.
Ah, superb. Greetings, my fellow Jedi. I thought I'd only find Republic military on this frequency.
Hello.
Superb, Major. I didn't expect such a distinguished member of the Republic's military. My outlook is less grim.
Hello.
Ah, Captain. Nice of you to respond to a Republic military alert.
Be brief.
Of course.
I only do critical missions.
The circumstances are dire.
There's unusual activity in a cave system near your location. A being known as Elshuu is incarcerated there, along with his mindless disciples.
Scans suggest that Elshuu's followers have awoken and are trying to free him. The stasis fields restraining him are weakening.
Tell me about Elshuu.
Who is this being?
Little is known. It's believed he communed with the dark side of the Force until it drove him mad.
He sent his followers on a rampage through the galaxy, killing indiscriminately. One of the bloodiest events in known history.
No one living has even seen Elshuu. It's unclear if he is a man or some kind of monster.
What's needed?
What's needed?
I'm intrigued.
I hope your interest translates to action.
Doubt it's worth concern.
Your flippancy is poorly timed and miscalculated.
Just my luck.
Sorry to dampen your day with such an inconvenience.
"Scans suggest"?
"Scans suggest"?
Why must you waste time doubting me?
It is paramount that Elshuu's disciples are stopped from freeing him, and that he is forever silenced so that he may never corrupt another.
If you don't take this on, whatever blood Elshuu and his minions spill will be on your hands.
Shut up, I'm in.
It will be done.
It will be done.
I sense incredible power coming from him. When you confront him, be prepared for anything.
I hope I see you again. Victorious.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
I hope you reconsider.
It's an unfortunate case when deadly force is the only option. But I hope you will undertake it.
Whatever must be.
[This monitoring station appears to be deactivated.]
